DOC.brief_summary: The aim study describe immunogenicity single booster dose Adacel vaccine versus Boostrix vaccine among approximately 420 adolescent 11 < 13 year age . Primary objective : - To describe seroprotection rate tetanus diphtheria subject randomize receive either Adacel Boostrix vaccine . Observational objective : - To describe pre- post-vaccination tetanus , diphtheria , pertussis geometric mean antibody concentration ( GMCs ) subject randomize receive either Adacel Boostrix vaccine . - To describe booster response rate tetanus , diphtheria , pertussis subject randomize receive either Adacel Boostrix vaccine . - To describe rate adverse event ( AEs ) immediately post-vaccination , rate unsolicited AEs serious adverse event ( SAEs ) follow vaccination Adacel Boostrix vaccine Visit 1 Visit 2 .
DOC.detailed_description: Participants randomize 1:1 ratio receive either Adacel Boostrix vaccine . Subjects monitor immediate reaction 15 minute post-vaccination . Unsolicited adverse event serious adverse event collect Visit 1 Visit 2 .
